participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative, passionate about teaching and self-expression, and enjoys unique fashion choices.
participant_1.background: I like to eat healthy foods so that I have energy to teach my students. I love to be unique, and I think it's really cool to express myself through my fashion choices. I only have three best friends. I like to watch ma. My parents are proud of me for following my musical dreams.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outspoken and adventurous, loves music and cooking, and is determined to forge his own path.
participant_2.background: I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much. I love going to concerts and dancing hard. I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book. I'm a young person who doesn't want to continue my family's business. I love creating new recipes.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do?
I like going to concerts and dancing hard.
That sounds fun! I love dancing too.
What kind of music do you like to dance to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I especially love dancing to hip hop and R&B.
Me too! I love to dance to anything that gets me moving.
I know what you mean. I love to dance so much that I even teach dance classes at my local community center.
Wow, that's so cool! I've always wanted to take dance classes, but I've never had the time.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's so much fun and a great way to get exercise.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
That's awesome! I love to cook.
Me too! I love creating new recipes and trying new things.
Me too! I love to experiment in the kitchen.
That's great! We should cook together sometime.
Great! We can exchange recipes and cook up a storm.
